content: Hi all, as previously mentioned, we will have a second CSLib community call at 4 pm UK time/ 8 am California time today (in ~30 minutes). Please use this meeting link.
(Y'all need to do meeting announcements more than a few hours or minutes in advance. My suggestion: 7 days, 1 day, 30 minutes)
I think they announced it even before the first meeting last week. At least it ended up in my calendar somehow.
Point taken! We did mention this at some point on this Zulip, but we should have created a clearly marked thread.
I'm sorry to have missed the call yesterday. Do we have a shared calendar to follow?
Is there going to be another call today?
There was not a call today. We don't have another community call scheduled yet. We will post here (in advance) before the next one.
